text: The Moldovan Football Federation (, FMF) is the governing body of football in Moldova. It organizes all the football leagues, including the top tier league Moldovan National Division (Divizia Națională), and the Moldova national football team. It is based in Chișinău. The current president is Leonid Oleinicenco. ==External links== *Official website *Moldova at UEFA website *Moldova at FIFA website Moldova Category:Football in Moldova Category:Futsal in Moldova Football Category:Sports organizations established in 1990 Category:1990 establishments in the Moldavian Soviet Socialist Republic Category:Sport in Chișinău
title: Moldovan Football Federation
